DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate ovary may function use Implanon®/Nexplanon® three year beyond FDA approve duration . Ovarian function assess weekly serum progesterone level . Participants undergo weekly venipuncture total four draw . Participants follow 30 day .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Ovarian Function During Prolonged Implant Use
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort evaluate ovarian function 210 ENG user three year beyond FDA approve duration . Participants enrol current study , EPIC ( Evaluating Prolonged Use IUD Implant Contraception , NCT02267616 ) , contact via telephone , screen schedule enroll person . After signed consent obtain participant ask complete brief questionnaire demographic information bleeding pattern . Participants undergo blood draw ass serum etonogestrel serum progesterone level . Follow visit include weekly blood draw three week assess serum progesterone level . Participants also complete bleed diary assess daily bleeding pattern 30 day study period . The investigator enroll participant seven time point ; method expiration ( 3 year use ) , six-month interval six year use .
DOC.criteria: Enrolled prospective EPIC Prolonged Use Study 1845 year age At expiration beyond end FDAapproved duration use etonogestrelreleasing subdermal implant ( ENG implant =3 year ) Ability consent English Willing able complete require followup study .
